content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a wooden chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Inserter and chest system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5), a wooden chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5), and another wooden chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67} and status EntityStatus.NO_RESEARCH_IN_PROGRESS

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when out of fuel
- Ensure that the burner mining drill and boiler have sufficient fuel before operating
### Errors when no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before operating
### Errors when chest is full
- Ensure that the chest has sufficient space before attempting to insert items
### Errors when no input liquid or fluid present in connections
- Ensure that the steam engine and boiler have the necessary input liquid or fluid connections before operating
### Errors when no coal in inventory
- Ensure that the agent has sufficient coal in its inventory before attempting to refuel entities
